name: Ben La Terre
description:
WIP

▢▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨ - STORY - ▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▧▨▧▨▢

I am Ben, a gnome. 

Due to a particular law which is troublesome, I decided to get out of my tiny little hole and go change things up! 

I've chosen to make a big strike, and so Ben needs his fellow little gnomes. Gotta take them out and EXPLODE EVERYTHING !! 

This law isn't going to take our money away, gnomes want it back... and if we gotta explode this whole city, well that's what Ben will have to do...

-

▢▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧ - GAME JAM INTERMAISON - ▨▧▨▧▨▧▨▧▧▨▧▨▢
